• home

Microneedling Cape Town: Get Your Youth Back!

You’re tired of dealing with the appearance of your skin. You’ve tried other treatments before, but they never seemed to work.

After just a few sessions, you notice that your skin is looking younger and more vibrant. Microneedling is an affordable and effective treatment for reducing the appearance of wrinkles and scars.

Looking for a cosmetic procedure that’s affordable and effective? Try micro needling! Our tiny sterilized needles will help your body make more collagen and elastin, which will heal your skin and reduce the appearance of wrinkles, scars, and sun damage.
Book Your procedure

What is microneedling and how does it work?

Microneedling is a minimally-invasive cosmetic procedure that uses fine needles to create tiny punctures in the skin. This stimulates the body’s natural healing process, which leads to the production of new collagen and elastin.


The result is younger-looking, healthier skin. Microneedling can be used to improve the appearance of wrinkles, scars, and sun damage. Microneedling is a safe and effective cosmetic procedure. The needles used are very fine and sterile. The procedure is often done with a numbing cream to minimize any discomfort.

Microneedling is also known as collagen-induction therapy.  The induction of collagen for firm, tighter, and more youthful-looking skin.

Book Your procedure

The benefits of microneedling

  • Reduced appearance of wrinkles and fine lines
  • Reduced appearance of scars
  • Improved skin tone and texture
  • Stimulated collagen production
  • Improved absorption of topical treatments
  • Improve appearance of pigmentation
  • Renew skin appearance with radiant and glowing skin
  • Advanced Anti-Aging Treatment
Book Your procedure

How Does the Microneedling Procedure Work at Blink Beauty Salons?

Before Treatment

During your consultation, we will assess your skin type and condition. We will also discuss your goals for treatment.

The treatment is non-invasive and can be done at our salon every 4 weeks if needed. The procedure will take around one hour, depending on the area treated and the problem’s severity.

During Treatment

A numbing cream will be applied to the skin before treatment. The micro-needling device will be passed over the skin several times. The micro-needling device punctures the skin in a cross-hatching pattern, and the expert moves the instrument over the skin several times for optimal effects. Your body will recognize you’ve been wounded and start the healing process by producing collagen and elastin.

After Treatment

You may experience some redness, skin warmth, and a tingling sensation. This is normal and should resolve itself within 24 hours. We will provide you with aftercare instructions.

You should avoid sun exposure and use sunscreen for at least one week after treatment.

Book Your procedure

Why Choose Blink Beauty for Your Microneedling Treatment?

Skin needling is a safe and effective cosmetic procedure. It is minimally invasive and can be done in an office setting.

Our micro-needling treatment removes fine lines, wrinkles, and stretch marks.

At Blink Beauty, we are skincare experts. We will assess your skin type and condition and develop a treatment plan that is right for you.

Schedule your appointment today to learn more about microneedling and how it can help you achieve your goals for healthier, younger-looking skin.

Book Your procedure

Microneedling before and after

Book Your procedure

Today was my 3rd visit, 2 sessions of eyeliner removal and 1st session having professional perninant eyeliner applied. I also did my first session of micro needling. It was not as scary as I imagined it. I look forward to my eyeliner touch up in a few weeks and next session of micro needling. Feeling so pampered today

I’m eternally grateful to her for giving me a major confidence boost, because her work has made me look so beautiful. Book Your procedure

What does microneedling cost?

  • Face (60 minutes) R1 500
  • Face and neck (60 minutes) R2 100
  • Face, neck & chest (60 minutes) R2 300
  • Stretch marks - 10cm x 10cm (60 minutes) R1 500
  • Stretch marks - 20cm x 20cm (60 minutes) R3 000
Book Your procedure

Frequently asked questions about microneedling

What is microneedling?

Microneedling is a minimally-invasive cosmetic procedure that uses fine needles to create tiny punctures in the skin. This stimulates the body's natural healing process, which leads to the production of new collagen and elastin.
The result is younger-looking, healthier skin. Microneedling can be used to improve the appearance of wrinkles, scars, and sun damage.

What are the benefits of microneedling?

Microneedling has many benefits, including the reduced appearance of wrinkles and fine lines, reduced appearance of scars, improved skin tone and texture, stimulated collagen production, and improved absorption of topical treatments.

Is microneedling safe?

Yes, microneedling is a safe and effective cosmetic procedure. The needles used are very fine and sterile. The procedure is often done with a numbing cream to minimize any discomfort.

How long does a microneedling session take?

Microneedling sessions usually take 30 minutes to an hour.

How often should I get microneedling done?

Microneedling is typically done once a month for three to six months, depending on your goals and objectives.

Will I see results after just one session?

Some people do see noticeable results after just one microneedling session. However, most people will see the best results after three to six sessions.

Are there any side effects associated with microneedling?

Microneedling is a safe and effective cosmetic procedure with minimal side effects. The most common side effect is mild redness and swelling, which usually subsides within a few hours.

Is there any downtime associated with microneedling?

There is no downtime associated with microneedling. You may experience some redness and swelling, but this should subside within a few hours.

What are the risks associated with microneedling?

Microneedling is a safe and effective cosmetic procedure with minimal risks. The most common risk is mild redness and swelling, which usually subsides within a few hours.

Can microneedling be used to treat acne scars?

Yes, microneedling can be used to improve the appearance of acne scars. Microneedling stimulates the body's natural healing process, which can lead to the production of new collagen. The new collagen can help fill in acne scars and improve the appearance of the skin.

What are the advantages of microneedling over other skin resurfacing treatments?

Microneedling is suitable for all kinds and hues of skin. It may also be used on parts of the body that aren't conducive to chemical peels or laser resurfacing treatments. Furthermore, treated and untreated regions are not clearly distinguished, allowing scars to be reduced while yet preserving the surface area's natural blending into surrounding surfaces.
